If you are interested in this game, please go somewhere else. This game is like a toxic relationship, treating you just well enough to keep you around, but still kicks you when you're down. Not only does this game have way too many game breaking bugs, even at 1600 hours I get teammates with under 200 hours on my team who have no idea what is going on. Please stay away from this game! This game will be the death of me!

九个小时的萌新，先说一下我自己的感受吧
杀机是我很久之前就知道的游戏初中那会儿见别人玩过，无奈何价钱对我来说是个问题，上了高中之后有了自己的经济管理权，也就入手了这款游戏
首先吹爆，别的不说，小工作室，虽然有很多bug，但无论是这种非对抗竞技还是游戏体验，都很棒
其次就是吹某易的第五的，我觉得吧，就没法比、
个人推荐当屠夫别收尸，本来游戏人就不多，相对来讲大家都是玩的游戏体验感，而且萌新首要任务是赚取血点， 多砍几下也是极好的（哈哈哈）
屠夫的话萌新一定推荐先联系夹哥，其他的刚上手不是那么好掌握
因为我基本都是一个人玩，所以人类玩的并不多
总之买买买，打折更要买
ХАРОШАЯ ИГРА

不推荐购买，这款16年的游戏距今已经3年了， 游戏玩法没有太大的改变 依旧单一无趣，没什么玩点。来说说这个游戏我认为非常不公的地方吧，1：扮演杀手的玩家可以单方面控制扮演人类玩家的游戏体验 这是我非常不爽的一点  也是觉得不公平的一点 很早之前就出现了这个问题  但是制作组的无能 并没有让这个问题得到解决  到现在依旧如此  2：低段位还是有一些萌新的，但是这些刚入坑玩了1/2小时的萌新会接受各种人的毒打  改档，开挂等等 在低段位很常见  单排人类玩家没有一点点游戏体验  特别是在低段位 甚至段位高一点 还是无济于事。3：人类/屠夫上段机制的不合理 早期这个机制还是看得过去了 但是现在改的很迷  甚至可以说苛刻，会出现同段位屠夫技术碾压人类的情况，也就是屠夫段位虚低，人类段位虚高 4：游戏环境，现在这个游戏很暴躁，就像是仇人一般 非常暴戾，让人窒息 推荐还是当个云玩家比较自在。

Put the time in, and the game gets really fun for killer or survivor. This game is not meant to stick to just one character. play them all and level each one up to unlock their 3 special perks. Once you have all the unique character perks for either survivor or killer, you can choose your favorite one and level them up repeatedly until that character has all the perks and this will be your "Main" character. There are daily rituals and also the updates never stop. get this game while a sale is on to get the most out of your $$$.
Its very fun and you can kill your friends or survive with them, though it can be very hard to level up and sometimes it gets annoying and it is not very scary, still fun though

No

The matchmaking is complete shit, the hitboxes are buggy and way to big. If a perk is good it will be nerfed asap, you will constantly meet salty and toxic people, egotistical and useless teammates, camping and tunneling killers, and the ranking system is broken af. 

The game is grindy AF: which is why I can't recommend the game for new people anymore; it takes a shitton of hours just to get a half-decent build. I've play for over 800 hours, do you think I'm even close to having all the perks I want on all the charaters? Not even close.

Seriously can't stress enough how bad the ranking system is. Whose idea was it to make a team-based game with a competitive ranking system that rewards being selfish and uncooperative while discouraging self-sacrifice and risks? The Killers are also encourged to camp, tunnel, and slug as it is proven to be a good strat, is it fun for anyone else? no. Not even sure its fun for killers tbh.

When you look past all that and/ or have at least 1 friend to play with I have to say it can be a surprisingly fun time, beneath all the bullshit there is a gem of a game hidden; but your gonna have to dig to find it.

if you want to buy a game to have a fun, nice relaxing time playing then this isn't the game for you with how many bugs the game has with every patch it either ruins the game or it can just be something funny to see. But seeing as how slow updates are pumped out and with how many bugs there are every single patch; some of which don't get patched for 3 chapters! (looking at that hook movement bug). This game will be going downhill if it is to have a competitor but if it does have one then maybe the devs will put more effort into the game because I do care about the game it's just the devs are exploiting the fact that Dead by Daylight is a one of a kind. behaviour does have the time and the people to pump out content frequently, they just choose not to

[i]☐ Это заменит тебе жизнь!
☐ Запоминающийся.
☐ Интересный.
☐ Не скучный.
☐ Лучше иди поспи.
☑ Сюжет?[/i]

[b]ᅠ~ Графика ~ [/b]
[i]☐ Реальность выглядит хуже.
☑ Сочная.
☐ Хорошая.
☐ Приемлимо.
☐ Плохая.
☐ Там что-то есть?
☐ Опасно для глаз![/i]

[b]ᅠ~ Геймплей ~ [/b]
[i]☐ Этим можно заниматься вечно!
☐ Интересен.
☑ Просто геймплей.

☐ Лучше просто сидеть на месте.
☐ Похоже разрабы забыли, что делали игру...[/i]

[b]ᅠ~ Аудио ~ [/b]
[i]☐ Экстаз!
☐ Очень хороша!
☐ Хороша!
☑ Сойдет.
☐ Ваш голос звучит лучше...
☐ Играй без звука.[/i]

[b]ᅠ~ Динамика ~ [/b]
[i]☐ Что здесь происходит?!
☐ Очень динамично.

☐ Спокойно.

[b]ᅠ~ Сложность ~ [/b]

[b]ᅠ~ Прокачка ~ [/b]
